title: From Hiroshima to Cold War
description: The annihilation of Hiroshima ends the war with Japan, but peace brings new enmities and flashpoints: Divided Berlin, Korea, Hungary and Suez. With Jonathan Dimbleby.
itunes:subtitle: The annihilation of Hiroshima ends the war with Japan.
